body: Yeah true but good enough like that

It's too predictable. Woulda been more awesome if she retained her sanity after completing her vampirazation and then stabbed the count through the heart, then become the new vampire lord herself. It lets her get her revenge and at the same time completes her fall into depravity. It's more satisfying that way, imo.
Thought the vampire going to glitter. Oh well! 69 points to Gryffindor! If you know what I mean Harry?
Is there a sequel or a prequel to this?
